page.title: 13Redlynch Adult Activities
page.content: Various groups in the village cater for the interests and enthusiasms of the adult inhabitants. A keep fit group for ladies meets regularly in the village hall. They recently gave a display at the Lover Week Fete.They also have a junior section. The village hall is also the meeting place of the Redlynch Players, a drama group which has just over twenty members.They aim to give two productions a year, their most recent being four mini-dramas. Other groups include the Women's Institute, Mother's Union and a wives group. There is a flower arranging group and a horticultural society. Sports societies exist for cricket and football.
